discussion.author: fredrikekre
discussion.text: I see from your README that you also have seen https://github.com/fhs/NPZ.jl. Do you think it would make sense/have you considered adding the extra functionality from your package to that one? (I have not looked at implementations etc, and its fine if you want your own package, just wondering).

discussion.author: hwjsnc
discussion.text:
(I am quf at gitlab.com.)
Honestly, I had not really considered it.
I will contact the author of NPZ.jl, so please hold off on merging this for now.
